name: Dorgan's Diner 2022
description:
Dorgan's Diner:

You are a dragon chef who goes through levels collecting ingredients while avoiding monsters made of food.

Controls:

  • A/D - Move left and right
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Click - Breath fire

Collect food before it rots to make the recipes in each level. Kill the enemies with fire but don't get hit too many times or you can die.

Credits:

Producer: Alex

Artists:

  • Tuli (background and dorgan design/animator),
  • Eric (enemies, tiles, and food assets),
  • Alex (misc.)

Programmers:

  • Evan (Scrolling background, enemies, UI),
  • Nate (Level design, Recipes, Rotting food)

Music and Sound: Julian
